__e: Fanny is still a child and children cannot be held responsible, I think.
Those who are habituated to the Marshalsea are pleased to call me its father.
Fanny's become almost a stranger. Edward nowhere to be seen this evening, when lately he's been so regular.
Fanny, I've been meaning to ask you, how long are you staying?
For I am prodigious fond of Fanny.
I'll handle this myself. Fanny, dear, I called to tell you that I won't be home for supper tonight. I have a very important business engagement across town.
